name: Grimistar: once more with feeling
description:
Grimistars back! He's bigger, he's brighter! He's still looking for a worthy adversary!

movement = W,S,A,D

Shooting (before upgrade...) = spacebar

T.O.Jam's 2018's favorite maniacal monster is now in a new game with:

  • new graphics!
  • new music!
  • Power up you ship with over 8 new upgrades!
  • new "winning isn't everything" mechanic!
  • and whole new  view into this space opera!

Earth, third planet of the Milkyway system. The evil Grimistar turned this once thriving system into his personal sandbox. General Goatsticker of the TippedJammer army was successful in exiling this maniacal monster to the barren deserted planet of Uranus. 

3 years later, General Goatsticker noticed strange activity coming from Uranus (might wanna get that checked out). The TippedJammers have once again been called into action to free the Milkyway system once and for all.

George: www.sonicarcade.com
Indigo:  https://www.artstation.com/indigodoyle
Luca: https://www.lucrecious.com/
Rocco: http://tippedchair.com/index.html
Chris Thior (OG Dialog)
